page.title: 18TRANSPORT PROBLEMS IN BOURNE
page.content: Bourne is a market town and some of the main roads are too narrow and twisting to cope with today's traffic. The articulated lorries often have to run up the kerbs because there is not enough room for them to turn.We think a by-pass should be made to take the heavy traffic,like lorries and caravans,away from the town centre.A by-pass would mean that there would not be so many{traffic jams}in Bourne. This year in Bourne there have been a number of accidents caused by the heavy traffic. We think Bourne should have more car parks. We also think they should move the market stalls because they take up half of the road and cars have to queue up.Burghley Street is another narrow road and should be made a one way street.
